name: masonCLI
body:
# masonCLI
masonCLI is made for math. It is a command-line interface that does math easily and simply.

This program is created, programmed, and maintained by a High School Sophomore, so it cannot do calculus-level math.
![The first prompt](http://i.imgur.com/vIksAlC.png)

Here's an example of masonCLI in action.
![ratios](http://i.imgur.com/kjtqMIi.png)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
